pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bubble Chart to Compare Biological Annotations by using DAVID // R-based graphical tool to concisely visualise and compare biological annotations queried from the DAVID web service. It provides R functions to perform enrichment analysis (via DAVID - http://david.abcc.ncifcrf.gov) on several gene lists at once, and then visualizing all the results in one generated figure that allows R users to compare the annotations found for each list.
